title: clearspawnpoint
description: Removes the spawn point for a player.

fields.title: player
fields.description: The player whose checkpoint should be cleared. When using this command in a command block, a [target selector](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) or player name must be specified. When using this command in chat, if no target is specified, then default target is the player using the command.

overloads.title: Clearspawnpoint
overloads.description: Clear the spawn point of a given player.
